meaningMnemonic: Put a <radical>net</radical> around a <radical>criminal</radical> to show their <kanji>guilt</kanji>. Criminals look like anyone else on the street, so you decide to tie them in nets to make sure people know who they're dealing with.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>guilt</kanji> shows on the criminal's face. They smile, shrug, and pull a stolen <reading>xy</reading>lophone (ざい) out of their back pocket.
